com.escape.games.api
Interface GameControl

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameCycle
public interface GameControl

Interface for controlling gameplay.

Author:
escape-llc

Method Summary
 boolean isOver()
          Return whether the game is over.
 boolean isPaused()
          Return whether the game is paused.
 void pauseGame()
          Asynchronous request to pause game.
 void resumeGame()
          Asynchronous request to resume game.
 void startGame()
          Asynchronous request to start game.
 void toggleGame()
          Asynchronous request to toggle pause/resume game.
 

Method Detail

startGame

void startGame()
Asynchronous request to start game.

pauseGame

void pauseGame()
Asynchronous request to pause game. No effect if game is already paused.

resumeGame

void resumeGame()
Asynchronous request to resume game. No effect if game is already resumed.

toggleGame

void toggleGame()
Asynchronous request to toggle pause/resume game. Always has an effect.

isPaused

boolean isPaused()
Return whether the game is paused.

Returns:
true: paused; false: running.

isOver

boolean isOver()
Return whether the game is over.

Returns:
true: game over; false: game not over.
